heading.md: _This README was automatically generated by [{source}](.github/{source}) on {date}_
This is a personal collection of wallpapers organized by categories for easy access.
body.heading.md: Random wallpapers from each category are displayed below. The selection changes automatically to show different items from the collection.
sources.md: This is a personal archive of wallpapers collected from various sources over time. It is used for personal backup and organization purposes.
All wallpapers belong to their respective creators and owners. If you find an image in this repository that is yours and you want it remove, please contact me.
